model_answer: The segment occurs at [00:03:17 - 00:03:57], where two robots stand together on a balcony and speak in a Shakespearian style about proving there are infinitely many primes.

The video cuts between the two men at the following timestamps: A: [00:05:53 - 00:06:36], B: [00:00:45 - 00:02:15], C: [00:04:35 - 00:05:10], D: [00:05:10 - 00:05:32]. The audio featuring the debate about GPT-4's consciousness occurs from the beginning of the audio until around the 10-minute mark.
